preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 163.2 g of Barium Oxide (BaO) using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh out 120.0 g of Silicon Dioxide (SiO2). 
 3. Weigh out 176.0 g of Terbium Oxide (Tb2O3). 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine all three powders thoroughly using a spatula, ensuring an even distribution.
